title: An Act relative to dependent eligibility for Chapter 115 benefits

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Rush, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2488) of Michael F. Rush for legislation relative to dependent eligibility for Chapter 115 benefits.  Veterans and Federal Affairs.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

related_entities.name: committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/28/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/28/2025 from 01:00 PM-01:10 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                                        and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means
